attributes.action: provide state funding to research into reconstructing the extinct language of Cwmbraic (Cumbric)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to secure Government financial support to researchers of Cwmbraic (Cumbric), a native British language which was once widely spoken in the North of England and lowlands of Scotland. To many Britons the language is part of their Celtic heritage and a window onto their deep history. More research into this language, in particular in helping to reconstruct it could aid the work of historians.
